channel.title: setup on Taufik Achmad
channel.description: Recent content in setup on Taufik Achmad

item.title: 01: Set up
item.description: tl;dr To start, you’ll need the following in place (all are free): Recent versions of R and RStudio installed R: v >= 3.6.0, https://cloud.r-project.org/ RStudio: v >= 1.4, https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download A free GitHub account ( https://github.com/join) A working connection to GitHub from RStudio (see free book: https://happygitwithr.com/) A free Netlify account connected to your GitHub account ( https://app.netlify.com/signup) A recent version of the blogdown R package installed. A recent version of Hugo.
